pullrequest.title: Slimmed down the Plugin pull request (no more template specializations)

content.raw:
In the [next PR](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/pull-requests/59) there is an enormous amount of coverage in the integration test. I left it out of this PR because it would have been messy for the version history if we pulled over that integration test and then cut away the tests of the specialized plugins.

The `Plugin` class tests are all in the integration test because the `Plugin` class can't really do anything without the `PluginLoader`, which I think requires the tests to fall under INTEGRATION rather than UNIT.
content.html:
In the next PR there is an enormous amount of coverage in the integration test. I left it out of this PR because it would have been messy for the version history if we pulled over that integration test and then cut away the tests of the specialized plugins.

The Plugin class tests are all in the integration test because the Plugin class can't really do anything without the PluginLoader, which I think requires the tests to fall under INTEGRATION rather than UNIT.
